plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                      For the First Circuit



No.   07-1981


                            MUSA KARIM,

                           Petitioner,

                                v.

                MICHAEL MUKASEY, ATTORNEY GENERAL,

                            Respondent.



                              ERRATA

      The Opinion issued on March 13, 2008 is amended as follows:

      Page 3, Lines 5, 8 and 10 should read "Karim".
